summary: Experienced youth development professional focused on school success, leadership development, and community engagement. Bilingual in Spanish with extensive experience in program coordination, mentoring, tutoring, and family-school liaison work.

experience.title: Adventure Team Facilitator
experience.description: Facilitated low and high challenge course elements, group initiatives, rock climbing wall, and BMX course; planned activities to encourage personal growth; led training in team building; facilitated reflection activities to promote learning from experience; contributed to multicultural leadership initiatives and camp coordination.

experience.title: School Success Advocate
experience.description: Facilitated an extended-day program for 15 high school freshmen, providing academic support and development of social and school success skills. Acted as a bilingual liaison between school and families, partnered with teachers and counselors, developed after-school programming, tutored core subjects, and provided mentoring. Maintained student records and organized meetings; contributed to positive outcomes in recruitment, retention, and academic performance.

experience.title: Latino Mentor Program Coordinator
experience.description: Coordinated LAMP:ARA (Latinos Adelante Mentor Program: Apoyo y Recursos Acad√©micos); provided advocacy and intervention; supported leadership development and mentor sessions; communicated with families in Spanish; connected youth with resources; organized events, service days, college visits; managed program administration and confidentiality. Accomplishments include Arts-in-Schools grant funding and collaboration with partner organizations; chaperoned attendance at leadership conferences.

experience.title: Civic Engagement Intern
experience.description: Organized and managed Causa's volunteer engagement and voter registration; coordinated meetings with allied organizations; facilitated voter registration at naturalization ceremonies; canvassed for campaigns; maintained volunteer database and tracked engagement.

experience.title: Bilingual Writing Tutor
experience.description: Provided one-on-one tutoring in a safe space to support writing; used inquiry-based learning to develop curiosity and critical thinking; helped students structure theses, topic sentences, paragraphs, and essays; edited syntax and grammar; managed registration records.

education.degree: B.A. in Environmental Humanities and Politics
